T01n817u_001:4: lokeśa tvaṃ māmaśaraṇyaṃ rakṣa kṛpālo kuru kāruṇyam || 1 ||
T01n817u_001:6: māmavadhāraya mā viruvantaṃ trāhi mahākṛpa naumi bhavantam || 2 ||
T01n817u_001:8: pālaya bhagavannavalokaya māṃ yāvadavīciṃ yāmi na viṣamām || 3 ||
T01n817u_001:10: nātha mayā kṛtapāpamaśeṣaṃ nāśaya saṃprati kāyikadoṣam || 4 ||
T01n817u_001:14: adhunā tanmama mānasapāpaṃ sphoṭaya nātha karomi vilāpam || 6 ||
T01n817u_001:16: sattvā ye nivasanti sadā''rtā rakṣasi tāniti tava mayi vārtā || 7 ||
T01n817u_001:17: tena mamopari sṛja kāruṇyaṃ vīkṣya śarīragataṃ tāruṇyam |
T01n817u_001:18: iti śṛṇu bhagavan bhavati bhaṇāmi yāvannarakaṃ naiva viśāmi || 8 ||
T01n817u_001:19: kiṃ copetya karoṣi parārthaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmakṛtārtham |
T01n817u_001:20: athavā prekṣya kṛpā tava puṇyaṃ janayasi dṛṣṭaṃ kathamavipannam || 9 ||
T01n817u_001:21: smaraṇenāpi bhavasi parituṣṭaḥ kṣipasi ca kaluṣaṃ kimiti na dṛṣṭaḥ |
T01n817u_001:22: yasmād bhagavan parahitadakṣa kṣepaṃ mā kuru māmiha rakṣa || 10 ||
T01n817u_001:26: siddhayati yakṣastrīpuraveśaḥ tuṣyasi yasya tvaṃ lokeśa || 12 ||
T01n817u_001:28: te tvayi tuṣṭe puṣṭaśarīrā vilasantyarujo guṇagambhīrāḥ || 13 ||
T01n817u_001:29: garalaṃ vyādhirgrahaḍākinyaḥ śāntiṃ yānti sadā yoginyaḥ |
T01n817u_001:30: sarati na tasya puro yamadūtaḥ proto yasya ca tvaṃ jinabhūtaḥ || 14 ||
T01n817u_001:31: iti lokeśvara kiṃ kriyamāṇaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmatrāṇam |
T01n817u_001:34: nītaṃ janma mayā'smin sakalaṃ jaṭharanimittaṃ bhramatā vikalam || 16 ||
T01n817u_001:35: tatkuru saṃprati mama lokeśa praṇato vividhāñjalirahameṣaḥ |
T01n817u_001:36: yenābhuktvāpāyikadoṣaṃ sugatiṃ bhavato yāmi na mokṣam || 17 ||
T01n817u_001:45: paramapakurvaṃnnapi karuṇāvān mayi paritoṣaṃ na karoṣi bhavān |
T01n817u_001:47: sakalajanārthaṃ prati yā karuṇā sā kiṃ bhavato niyataspharaṇā |
T01n817u_001:48: yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantaṃ bhavataḥ purato māṃ viruvantam || 23 ||
T01n817u_001:49: nātha kṛpā te vyomaviśālā sattveṣu hi yathāmbudadhārā |
